title: 155: Jade Roper Tolbert’s Birth Stories & Traumatic Births (ft. Alexis Haines)
itunes:title: 155: Jade Roper Tolbert’s Birth Stories & Traumatic Births (ft. Alexis Haines)
description:
(TRIGGER WARNING: Traumatic births and sexual abuse) The Broads are joined by Bachelor Nation’s sweetheart Jade Roper Tolbert to discuss her births that did not go the way she expected. Alexis Haines then joins to talk about her work as a doula helping mothers with traumatic births and help mother’s who have experienced trauma go through birth and much more. 
**CHATTY BROADS WILL BE MATCHING DONATIONS UP TO $2000 TOWARDS THE NATIONAL BLACK DOULAS ASSOCIATIONS! DONATE HERE: https://gf.me/u/x6nqyp
JADE ROPER TOLBERT:
Check out her podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/mommies-tell-all/id1457381834
@jadelizroper
ALEXIS HAINES:
Check out her podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/recovering-from-reality/id1453429239
@itsalexishaines
**Alexis’ episode with Chatty Broads about addiction and recovery: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/152-addiction-recovery-w-alexis-haines/id1441571050?i=1000475808930
FOLLOW US:
Chatty Broads: @chattybroads
Bekah: @bekah
Jess: @thebaddmom
